#Text=Elderly woman says : " Hey , come back here . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Do n't worry , I 'll catch him . "
#Text=Bolin says : " Give it back , you dirty thief . "
#Text=Mako says : " Hey , I stole that fair and square . "
#Text=Mako says : " Ow , stop it .
#Text=" Elderly woman says : " Are n't you a little hero .
#Text=Here , let me give you a reward .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Two yuans ?!
#Text=Seriously ?!
#Text=I risked my life for you , as far as you know .
#Text=" Elderly woman says : " Why , you little hooligan !
#Text=" Mako says : " Nice grab , little brother .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Thanks .
#Text=Bread tastes so much better than what we ate yesterday .
#Text=" Mako says : " We did n't eat yesterday .
#Text=" Bolin says : " So much better .
#Text="
